event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU has a workload of any type queued for processing
event.name: GPU active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles where the GPU has a pending interrupt
event.name: GPU interrupt active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of tasks processed by the GPU fragment queue
event.name: Fragment tasks
event.title: Mali GPU Tasks

event.description: The number of cycles where work is queued for processing in the GPU fragment queue
event.name: Fragment queue active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles where work is queued in the GPU non-fragment queue
event.name: Non-fragment queue active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of main MMU address translations performed
event.name: MMU lookups
event.title: Mali MMU Stage 1 Translations

event.description: The number of external bus data write cycles
event.name: Write beats
event.title: Mali External Bus Beats

event.description: The number of external bus data read cycles
event.name: Read beats
event.title: Mali External Bus Beats

event.description: The number of L2 cache lookups performed
event.name: Any lookup
event.title: Mali L2 Cache Lookups

event.description: The number of L2 cache read lookups performed
event.name: Read lookup
event.title: Mali L2 Cache Lookups

event.description: The number of L2 cache write lookups performed
event.name: Write lookup
event.title: Mali L2 Cache Lookups

event.description: The number of cycles where a read is stalled waiting for the external bus
event.name: Read stall cycles
event.title: Mali External Bus Stalls

event.description: The number of cycles where a write is stalled waiting for the external bus
event.name: Write stall cycles
event.title: Mali External Bus Stalls

event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing a fragment workload
event.name: Fragment active
event.title: Mali Core Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles where at least one quad is present in the pre-pipe quad queue
event.name: Fragment FPKB active
event.title: Mali Core Cycles

event.description: The number of fragment threads started
event.name: Fragment threads
event.title: Mali Core Threads

event.description: The number of fragment helper threads started
event.name: Fragment helper threads
event.title: Mali Core Threads

event.description: The number of fine quads generated by the rasterization phase
event.name: Rasterized fine quads
event.title: Mali Core Quads

event.description: The number of quads that are undergoing early depth and stencil testing
event.name: Early ZS tested quads
event.title: Mali Core Quads

event.description: The number of quads killed by early depth and stencil testing
event.name: Early ZS killed quads
event.title: Mali Core Quads

event.description: The number of threads undergoing late depth and stencil testing
event.name: Late ZS tested threads
event.title: Mali Core Threads

event.description: The number of threads killed by late depth and stencil testing
event.name: Late ZS killed threads
event.title: Mali Core Threads

event.description: The number of tiles processed by the shader core
event.name: Tiles
event.title: Mali Core Tiles

event.description: The number of tiles killed by transaction elimination
event.name: Unchanged tiles killed
event.title: Mali Core Tiles

event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing some non-fragment workload
event.name: Non-fragment active
event.title: Mali Core Cycles

event.description: The number of non-fragment threads started
event.name: Non-fragment threads
event.title: Mali Core Threads

event.description: The number of cycles where the shader core is processing at least one warp
event.name: Execution core active
event.title: Mali Core Cycles

event.description: The number of instructions executed per warp
event.name: Executed instructions
event.title: Mali Core Instructions

event.description: The total number of load/store issue cycles
event.name: Load/store active
event.title: Mali Core Load/Store Cycles

event.description: The number of thread-width texture operations processed
event.name: Texture requests
event.title: Mali Core Texture Requests

event.description: The number of texture filtering issue cycles
event.name: Texturing active
event.title: Mali Core Texture Cycles

event.description: The number of load/store reads that hit in the cache
event.name: Read hits
event.title: Mali Core Load/Store Cycles

event.description: The total number of load/store read cycles
event.name: Read cycles
event.title: Mali Core Load/Store Cycles

event.description: The number of load/store writes that hit in the cache
event.name: Write hits
event.title: Mali Core Load/Store Cycles

event.description: The total number of load/store write cycles
event.name: Write cycles
event.title: Mali Core Load/Store Cycles

event.description: The number of load/store atomic accesses
event.name: Atomic access cycles
event.title: Mali Core Load/Store Cycles

event.description: The number of input triangle primitives
event.name: Triangle primitives
event.title: Mali Input Primitives

event.description: The number of input point primitives
event.name: Point primitives
event.title: Mali Input Primitives

event.description: The number of input line primitives
event.name: Line primitives
event.title: Mali Input Primitives

event.description: The number of front-facing triangles that are visible after culling
event.name: Front-facing primitives
event.title: Mali Visible Primitives

event.description: The number of back-facing triangles that are visible after culling
event.name: Back-facing primitives
event.title: Mali Visible Primitives

event.description: The number of primitives that are visible after culling
event.name: Visible primitives
event.title: Mali Primitive Culling

event.description: The number of primitives that are culled by facing or frustum XY plane tests
event.name: Facing and XY plane test culled primitives
event.title: Mali Primitive Culling

event.description: The number of primitives that are culled by frustum Z plane tests
event.name: Z plane test culled primitives
event.title: Mali Primitive Culling

event.description: The number of cycles where the tiler has a workload queued for processing
event.name: Tiler active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles
